name: Pina Earth
headline: Unlocking carbon markets for European forest owners
description: Pina Earth is building a suite of digital tools for data collection, monitoring, and certification of forest carbon projects. EU forests are at high risk due to climate change. With Pina Earth, forest owners can start high-quality carbon projects on their properties and use the new income stream to prepare their forests for a changing climate. Founded only last year, the startup already has active pilot projects on over 1,000 hectare (∼2,500 acres) in Germany. The founders met at CDTM and joined their expertise in sustainability science, software engineering, and machine learning to help EU forests.

founders.name: Gesa Biermann, Founder
founders.description: I have a background in environmental studies (PhD @LMU, M.Sc., @TU Munich) and business (C-level consulting at Kearney, Audi). Before founding Pina Earth, I co-led the Center for Digital Technology and Management (CDTM) in Munich for the four years of my doctoral research. At CDTM, I taught entrepreneurship and was responsible for partnerships (with e.g. Siemens AI, Adidas) as well as recruiting. CDTM is also where I met my co-founders, Jonas and Florian.

founders.name: Florian Fincke, Founder
founders.description: My main study background is in HCI (M.Sc. @ LMU in Munich, Germany). I specialized in affective computing & decision-support systems for expert users. Additionally, I attended an add-on study program in Technology Management @ the Center for Digital Technology and Management (CDTM) where I also met my co-founders. Since the beginning of my studies, I was working as a full-stack web and app developer at various early-stage start-ups including Alasco, ORDA, and ShoeSizeMe.

# Next Generation Carbon Credits from European Forests
Pina Earth offers high-quality carbon credits from local forests to turn pure stands into climate-resilient mixed forests
[For forest owners](https://pina.earth/</en/forest-owners>)
[For credit buyers](https://pina.earth/</en/credit-buyers>)

## Why do we need forest adaptation?
Promotion of climate resilience
60%
of EU biomass is now at risk of climate change.
central storage
45%
of the EU's land area is forest. These forests absorb about one third of human carbon emissions.
Increase of biodiversity
80%
of all terrestrial biodiversity is found in forests.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63ee6ad81c8fee672778b5fc_shutterstock_719379190%20\(1\)%20\(1\)%20\(3\)%202.jpg)
## Would you like to buy carbon credits or finance your forest adaptation measures?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63ee6ad82c6a3c9bcbb9c5dc_Wald-min%20\(1\).jpg)
### Start a project
Assess the carbon sink potential of your planned forest adaptation area
[For forest owner](https://pina.earth/</en/forest-owners>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63ee6ad7c6cf610ab8f28993_shutterstock_1842925174-min%202.jpg)
### Save local forests
Invest in high-quality climate protection projects in Germany
[For credit buyer](https://pina.earth/</en/credit-buyers>)
## What our customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/669a993723f876bcdeabbd6a_Partner_Airbnb_Pina%20Earth.png)
### Kathrin Anselm, Airbnb
 _"Our programme for voluntary climate contributions since its launch in summer 2023 is a central component of our commitment to sustainability. It emphasises our responsibility as a company at key moments in tourism and contributes directly to the positive impact of our initiatives."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/65f323132eb6f8aee521b918_polarstern_quote.png)
### Florian Henle, Polarstern
 _"Protecting native forests with Pina Earth and adapting them to environmental and climate conditions so that they continue to act as valuable carbon sinks is in line with our ideas of forward-looking, sustainable action."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/679ce30a03799c6d2c82834b_Partner_Quotes_Visuals.png)
### Aisha Petter, Strato
 _"The IT industry should play a key role in the fight against climate change, and we want to lead by example and show that IT and climate protection are highly compatible."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/65d766fddbb8583ccdd02228_Screenshot%202024-02-22%20at%2016.23.26.png)
### Ricarda D'ham, Kearney
 _"When selecting a partner, it has always been important to Kearney to support founders with their business ideas. It is great that Dr. Gesa Biermann and her company Pina Earth offer the opportunity to support regional climate action in form of carbon credits."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc598bdbaa98c2486d92c_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_Liefergru%CC%88n.png)
### Niklas Tauch, Liefergrün
 _"Liefergrün is a proud supporter of Pina Earth's regional forest adaptation projects. Our contribution makes forests climate-proof - right near our customers. In the future, we will continue to protect the climate with Pina Earth and make our contribution locally."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/6568981edc4a58ca72ea2501_Screenshot%202023-11-30%20at%2015.11.19.png)
### Marcus Gartenleitner, Südvers
 _"With Pina Earth, we have a partner that fits us perfectly. A modern, meaningful, German company that is operationally implementing one of the most important problems of our time with a win-win approach for everyone involved."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/651e80913946518975329c75_Partner_Quotes_trans-o-flex.jpg)
### Marlo Keno Geldon, trans-o-flex
 _"We are pleased to be working with Pina Earth because they are tackling the major challenge of forest dieback in Germany with state-of-the-art technology and the highest quality of service, thus making an important contribution to the preservation of forests."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc28dfe15e11e4b352009_Partner_Quotes_Visuals%20\(3\).png)
### Lena Scharr, Fokus Zukunft
 _"We are very happy about the great cooperation with Pina Earth. Through this cooperation, we can not only support this extraordinary project in Germany, but also expand the range of products for our customers with innovative, high-quality and regional climate protection projects."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc597c265cba5e4c9393f_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_patch.png)
### Robert Ralph, Patch
 _"I’m happy that the partnership with Pina Earth complements our project portfolio with European projects to scale unified climate action. The team’s expertise in developing solutions targeted to local ecosystems made it easy for us to engage in this partnership."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc597e70e909fa39acfb3_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_Squake.png)
### Philipp von Lamezan, SQUAKE
 _"Enabling better and easier climate change mitigation is core to SQUAKE's mission. With Pina Earth as our partner, we can now offer regional climate action in Germany to our clients. I am very proud to have the opportunity to participate in such targeted climate solutions."_
## Well known from leading media
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63adc7868ce5f07653ab29a8_logo_zeit_online_2017.svg)](https://pina.earth/<https:/zeitfuerx.de/klima/digitale-forstwirtschaft-mit-machine-learning-zum-mischwald/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63adc786268d188e5684fb1d_handelsblatt.webp)](https://pina.earth/<https:/www.handelsblatt.com/technik/it-internet/flagright-glocally-oder-voize-diese-deutschen-start-ups-haben-es-in-den-bekanntesten-accelerator-der-usa-geschafft/28246474.html>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63fc8605cad9a132b7456d5c_TechCrunch-Logo-2011.png)](https://pina.earth/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/02/01/pina-earth-carbon-credits/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63adc7877850427ddaa90835_sifted.png)](https://pina.earth/<https:/www.startbase.com/news/pina-earth-erhaelt-24-millionen-euro/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63eb6c60261296739dc4109a_2560px-Wirtschaftswoche-Logo.svg.png)](https://pina.earth/<https:/sifted.eu/articles/y-combinator-cohort-w22-startups/>)
## Supported by strong partners
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63eb6ce24ee463c4d6844970_ESA_logo_2020_Deep.png)![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63eb6ce166220796da65523f_eit-climate-kic-logo-vector.svg)![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63e62c6f05efe9ece4734324_Logo_YCombinator.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63f396dca9cd62ca7cc33757_Microsoft_logo_\(2012\).svg.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63fde6025fd49518d2f419f6_With%20Google.png)![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63f396dce3bd0b737bdf4029_Flag_of_Europe.svg.png)

## Wir verwenden Cookies!
Diese Website verwendet essentielle Cookies, um ihren ordnungsgemäßen Betrieb zu gewährleisten, und Tracking-Cookies, um zu verstehen, wie Sie mit ihr interagieren. Letztere werden nur nach Zustimmung gesetzt.
Ich stimme zuAnpassen
## Cookie-Einstellungen
Verwendung von Cookies
Wir verwenden Cookies, um die grundlegenden Funktionen der Website zu gewährleisten und um Ihr Online-Erlebnis zu verbessern. Sie können für jede Kategorie wählen, ob Sie sich an- oder abmelden möchten.
Funktionalität der CookiesFunktionalität der Cookies
Diese Cookies sind für das ordnungsgemäße Funktionieren unserer Website erforderlich. Ohne diese Cookies könnte die Website nicht richtig funktionieren.
Sicherheits-CookiesSicherheits-Cookies
Sicherheits-Cookies ermöglichen die Speicherung sicherheitsrelevanter Informationen, z. B. zur Authentifizierung, zum Schutz vor Betrug und für andere Maßnahmen zum Schutz des Nutzers.
Personalisierungs-CookiesPersonalisierungs-Cookies
Personalisierungs-Cookies können Cookies von Drittanbietern verwenden, um Inhalte zu personalisieren und Nutzer über verschiedene Websites und Geräte hinweg zu verfolgen.
Werbe-CookiesWerbe-Cookies
Werbe-Cookies werden von uns oder unseren Partnern verwendet, um Ihnen relevante Inhalte oder Werbung sowohl auf unserer Website als auch auf Websites von Dritten anzuzeigen. Dadurch können wir Profile auf der Grundlage Ihrer Interessen erstellen, sogenannte pseudonymisierte Profile. Anhand dieser Informationen ist es in der Regel nicht möglich, Sie direkt als Person zu identifizieren, da nur pseudonymisierte Daten verwendet werden. Ohne Ihre ausdrückliche Zustimmung erhalten Sie keine auf Ihre Interessen zugeschnittenen Inhalte und Werbung.
Ad user data
Ad user data
Ad personalization
Ad personalization
Analyse-CookiesAnalyse-Cookies
Analytics-Cookies ermöglichen es uns, die Leistung unserer Website und unserer Werbekampagnen zu messen. Wir verwenden sie, um die Anzahl der Besuche und die Quellen der Besuche auf unserer Website zu ermitteln. Wir verarbeiten die durch diese Cookies erhaltenen Daten in zusammengefasster Form, ohne Identifikatoren zu verwenden, die auf bestimmte Nutzer unserer Website hinweisen. Wenn Sie die Verwendung von Analyse-Cookies in Bezug auf Ihren Besuch deaktivieren, verlieren wir die Möglichkeit, die Leistung zu analysieren und unsere Maßnahmen zu optimieren.
Weitere Informationen
Wenn Sie Fragen zu meiner Politik in Bezug auf Cookies und Ihre Wahlmöglichkeiten haben, kontaktieren Sie uns bitte.

## Why do we need forest adaptation?
Promotion of climate resilience
60%
of EU biomass is now at risk of climate change.
central storage
45%
of the EU's land area is forest. These forests absorb about one third of human carbon emissions.
Increase of biodiversity
80%
of all terrestrial biodiversity is found in forests.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/63ee6ad81c8fee672778b5fc_shutterstock_719379190%20\(1\)%20\(1\)%20\(3\)%202.jpg)

## What our customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/669a993723f876bcdeabbd6a_Partner_Airbnb_Pina%20Earth.png)
### Kathrin Anselm, Airbnb
 _"Our programme for voluntary climate contributions since its launch in summer 2023 is a central component of our commitment to sustainability. It emphasises our responsibility as a company at key moments in tourism and contributes directly to the positive impact of our initiatives."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/65f323132eb6f8aee521b918_polarstern_quote.png)
### Florian Henle, Polarstern
 _"Protecting native forests with Pina Earth and adapting them to environmental and climate conditions so that they continue to act as valuable carbon sinks is in line with our ideas of forward-looking, sustainable action."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/679ce30a03799c6d2c82834b_Partner_Quotes_Visuals.png)
### Aisha Petter, Strato
 _"The IT industry should play a key role in the fight against climate change, and we want to lead by example and show that IT and climate protection are highly compatible."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/65d766fddbb8583ccdd02228_Screenshot%202024-02-22%20at%2016.23.26.png)
### Ricarda D'ham, Kearney
 _"When selecting a partner, it has always been important to Kearney to support founders with their business ideas. It is great that Dr. Gesa Biermann and her company Pina Earth offer the opportunity to support regional climate action in form of carbon credits."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc598bdbaa98c2486d92c_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_Liefergru%CC%88n.png)
### Niklas Tauch, Liefergrün
 _"Liefergrün is a proud supporter of Pina Earth's regional forest adaptation projects. Our contribution makes forests climate-proof - right near our customers. In the future, we will continue to protect the climate with Pina Earth and make our contribution locally."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/6568981edc4a58ca72ea2501_Screenshot%202023-11-30%20at%2015.11.19.png)
### Marcus Gartenleitner, Südvers
 _"With Pina Earth, we have a partner that fits us perfectly. A modern, meaningful, German company that is operationally implementing one of the most important problems of our time with a win-win approach for everyone involved."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/651e80913946518975329c75_Partner_Quotes_trans-o-flex.jpg)
### Marlo Keno Geldon, trans-o-flex
 _"We are pleased to be working with Pina Earth because they are tackling the major challenge of forest dieback in Germany with state-of-the-art technology and the highest quality of service, thus making an important contribution to the preservation of forests."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc28dfe15e11e4b352009_Partner_Quotes_Visuals%20\(3\).png)
### Lena Scharr, Fokus Zukunft
 _"We are very happy about the great cooperation with Pina Earth. Through this cooperation, we can not only support this extraordinary project in Germany, but also expand the range of products for our customers with innovative, high-quality and regional climate protection projects."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc597c265cba5e4c9393f_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_patch.png)
### Robert Ralph, Patch
 _"I’m happy that the partnership with Pina Earth complements our project portfolio with European projects to scale unified climate action. The team’s expertise in developing solutions targeted to local ecosystems made it easy for us to engage in this partnership."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a45aabed5955588a0fcbea/64afc597e70e909fa39acfb3_Partner_Quotes_Visuals_Squake.png)
### Philipp von Lamezan, SQUAKE
 _"Enabling better and easier climate change mitigation is core to SQUAKE's mission. With Pina Earth as our partner, we can now offer regional climate action in Germany to our clients. I am very proud to have the opportunity to participate in such targeted climate solutions."_

## Wir verwenden Cookies!
Diese Website verwendet essentielle Cookies, um ihren ordnungsgemäßen Betrieb zu gewährleisten, und Tracking-Cookies, um zu verstehen, wie Sie mit ihr interagieren. Letztere werden nur nach Zustimmung gesetzt.
Ich stimme zuAnpassen
## Cookie-Einstellungen
Verwendung von Cookies
Wir verwenden Cookies, um die grundlegenden Funktionen der Website zu gewährleisten und um Ihr Online-Erlebnis zu verbessern. Sie können für jede Kategorie wählen, ob Sie sich an- oder abmelden möchten.
Funktionalität der CookiesFunktionalität der Cookies
Diese Cookies sind für das ordnungsgemäße Funktionieren unserer Website erforderlich. Ohne diese Cookies könnte die Website nicht richtig funktionieren.
Sicherheits-CookiesSicherheits-Cookies
Sicherheits-Cookies ermöglichen die Speicherung sicherheitsrelevanter Informationen, z. B. zur Authentifizierung, zum Schutz vor Betrug und für andere Maßnahmen zum Schutz des Nutzers.
Personalisierungs-CookiesPersonalisierungs-Cookies
Personalisierungs-Cookies können Cookies von Drittanbietern verwenden, um Inhalte zu personalisieren und Nutzer über verschiedene Websites und Geräte hinweg zu verfolgen.
Werbe-CookiesWerbe-Cookies
Werbe-Cookies werden von uns oder unseren Partnern verwendet, um Ihnen relevante Inhalte oder Werbung sowohl auf unserer Website als auch auf Websites von Dritten anzuzeigen. Dadurch können wir Profile auf der Grundlage Ihrer Interessen erstellen, sogenannte pseudonymisierte Profile. Anhand dieser Informationen ist es in der Regel nicht möglich, Sie direkt als Person zu identifizieren, da nur pseudonymisierte Daten verwendet werden. Ohne Ihre ausdrückliche Zustimmung erhalten Sie keine auf Ihre Interessen zugeschnittenen Inhalte und Werbung.
Ad user data
Ad user data
Ad personalization
Ad personalization
Analyse-CookiesAnalyse-Cookies
Analytics-Cookies ermöglichen es uns, die Leistung unserer Website und unserer Werbekampagnen zu messen. Wir verwenden sie, um die Anzahl der Besuche und die Quellen der Besuche auf unserer Website zu ermitteln. Wir verarbeiten die durch diese Cookies erhaltenen Daten in zusammengefasster Form, ohne Identifikatoren zu verwenden, die auf bestimmte Nutzer unserer Website hinweisen. Wenn Sie die Verwendung von Analyse-Cookies in Bezug auf Ihren Besuch deaktivieren, verlieren wir die Möglichkeit, die Leistung zu analysieren und unsere Maßnahmen zu optimieren.
Weitere Informationen
Wenn Sie Fragen zu meiner Politik in Bezug auf Cookies und Ihre Wahlmöglichkeiten haben, kontaktieren Sie uns bitte.

generated_description:
### Pina Earth: Championing Carbon Markets for European Forests

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Munich, Germany  
**Team Size:** 8  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W22

#### Mission
Pina Earth is on a mission to unlock carbon markets for European forest owners. The startup addresses a pressing concern: the vulnerability of EU forests to climate change. By equipping forest owners with a suite of digital tools for data collection, monitoring, and certification of forest carbon projects, Pina Earth enables them to initiate high-quality carbon projects. This not only helps preserve forests but also provides a new income stream for owners, aiding them in adapting their forests to changing environmental conditions.

#### What They Do
Pina Earth specializes in providing high-quality carbon credits sourced from local forests, transforming pure stands into climate-resilient mixed forests. Their approach promotes climate resilience, focusing on the fact that around 60% of EU biomass is at risk from climate change. Remarkably, they already have pilot projects covering over 1,000 hectares (about 2,500 acres) in Germany.

#### Founders
The founders, who met at the Center for Digital Technology and Management (CDTM), combine expertise in sustainability science, software engineering, and machine learning. This diverse skill set is vital in crafting tools that promote effective forest management and carbon credit trading.

#### Partnerships and Customers
Pina Earth works with an impressive roster of partners and clients, including notable names like Airbnb, Red Bull, and Polarstern, all of whom value the innovative ways the company enables climate action through carbon credits. The startup has garnered recognition, being awarded the title of “Digital Start-up of the Year 2024.”

#### Current Focus Areas
1. **Forest Owner Engagement:** Educating and enabling forest owners to capitalize on carbon credits.
2. **Credit Buyer Support:** Connecting businesses and organizations looking to purchase carbon credits with local conservation projects.
3. **Promoting Climate Resilience:** Engaging in forestry practices that boost biodiversity and combat negative climate impacts.

#### Media Recognition
Pina Earth has captured attention from various major media outlets, establishing itself as a leader in the climate tech space. Coverage includes features in *TechCrunch*, *Handelsblatt*, and *Wirtschaftswoche*.

#### Contact
Interested parties can reach out via email at team@pina.earth or call +49 1517 433 5250. They also encourage arranging introductory meetings to discuss forest adaptation projects and carbon credit opportunities.

For more information, visit their website: [Pina Earth](https://pina.earth/en).

---

With its innovative approach and dedication to sustainability, Pina Earth is not just another startup; it's a beacon of potential in the fight against climate change, transforming the way we think about forests and carbon markets in Europe.
